card.name: Zurgo Helmsmasher
card.property: Haste Zurgo Helmsmasher attacks each combat if able. Zurgo Helmsmasher has indestructible as long as it's your turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Zurgo Helmsmasher this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Zurgo Helmsmasher.

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
card.property: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Infantry Veteran
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Leonin Snarecaster
card.property: When Leonin Snarecaster enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
card.property: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Goblin Deathraiders
card.property: Trample

card.name: Hellraiser Goblin
card.property: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.

card.name: Fleshbag Marauder
card.property: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Goblin Warchief
card.property: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.

card.name: Hell's Thunder
card.property: Flying, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Hell's Thunder. Unearth {4}{R} ({4}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Kathari Bomber
card.property: Flying When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber. Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shambling Remains
card.property: Shambling Remains can't block. Unearth {B}{R} ({B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mardu Heart-Piercer
card.property: Raid — When Mardu Heart-Piercer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Mardu Heart-Piercer deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Beetleback Chief
card.property: When Beetleback Chief enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Krenko, Mob Boss
card.property: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

card.name: Ogre Battledriver
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Flame-Kin Zealot
card.property: When Flame-Kin Zealot enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Scourge Devil
card.property: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Oni of Wild Places
card.property: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Reckless Abandon
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Arc Trail
card.property: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to another target.

card.name: Goblin Bombardment
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Krenko's Command
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Dauntless Onslaught
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Orcish Cannonade
card.property: Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you. Draw a card.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.property: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Fury of the Horde
card.property: You may exile two red cards from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Banefire
card.property: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ghitu Encampment
card.property: Ghitu Encampment enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Nomad Outpost
card.property: Nomad Outpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.

card.name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
card.property: {T}: Draw three cards. {2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Faerie Impostor
card.property: Flying When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Coral Trickster
card.property: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Coral Trickster is turned face up, you may tap or untap target permanent.

card.name: Fathom Seer
card.property: Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

card.name: Jeskai Elder
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Jeskai Elder deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.name: Willbender
card.property: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Sparkmage Apprentice
card.property: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Lone Missionary
card.property: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Master Decoy
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Echo Tracer
card.property: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Kor Hookmaster
card.property: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Stonecloaker
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. When Stonecloaker enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Aquamorph Entity
card.property: As Aquamorph Entity enters the battlefield or is turned face up, it becomes your choice of 5/1 or 1/5. Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Hussar Patrol
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Vigilance

card.name: Lightning Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance, haste

card.name: Faerie Invaders
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

card.name: Thousand Winds
card.property: Flying Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Fleeting Distraction
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Stave Off
card.property: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Swift Justice
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.

card.name: Impulse
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Lightning Helix
card.property: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Hold the Line
card.property: Blocking creatures get +7/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Inferno Trap
card.property: If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Steam Augury
card.property: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Traumatic Visions
card.property: Counter target spell. Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Whiplash Trap
card.property: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Arrow Volley Trap
card.property: If four or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {1}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Arrow Volley Trap deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

card.name: Repeal
card.property: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Mystic Monastery
card.property: Mystic Monastery enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
